title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. V, subch. J, pt. 410 - Application Of Workers' Compensation Board Rules To The Volunteer Ambulance Workers' Benefit Law
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. V, subch. J, pt. 410 - Application Of Workers' Compensation Board Rules To The Volunteer Ambulance Workers' Benefit Law

State Regulations
§ 410.1 - Application of rules of the workers' compensation board to the volunteer ambulance workers' benefit law

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. V, subch. J, pt. 410

Statutory authority: Workers' Compensation Law, §§ 13[a], 13-l, 117, 141; Volunteer Ambulance Workers' Benefit Law, §§ 16, 57, 58; Volunteer Firefighters' Benefit Law, §§ 16, 57, 58

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
